title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to open the popup menu in Java editor ruler in Photon, it doesn't appear as expected.
OB: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler. This should display a menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc., but the menu does not appear.
EB: When right clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, a popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR: 1) Open a Java editor. 2) Right click on the left vertical ruler to trigger the popup menu. Verify that the menu does not appear.
